name: RoBot (YanMing)
description:
"Move the small robot with WASD"

"Interact with small power source and button using the space bar"

In this game, you play as a small robot with a power cable limiting its range of movement. The theme of the game jam, "Root," is incorporated into the game through this restriction. Your goal is to extend the power cable by connecting it to various points, ultimately reaching the main power source at the end. The challenge is to navigate the obstacles and find the correct path to the endpoint.Have fun and may the power be with you as you embark on this exciting journey to connect the power source!

使用WASD移動小機器人

使用空白鍵和小電源和按鈕互動

遊戲中，您扮演一個小型機器人，其移動範圍受到電源線的限制。 game jam 的主題“Root”通過這一限制融入到遊戲中。您的目標是通過將電源線連接到不同的點來延長電源線，最終在末端連接到主電源。挑戰在於克服障礙並找到到達終點的正確路徑。在您踏上連接電源的激動人心的旅程時，祝您玩得開心，願力量與您同在！
